About

What are Third Thursdays

On the Third Thursday of every month, we gather and dig deep into topics that are often treated at a surface level.

Basically its an excuse for Lisha Li and Ben Reinhardt to be curious with our friends.

This entire site is open source, so if you want to contribute to a topic, please send a pull request.
